name: The toy's have infected people O.O
name_original: The toy's have infected people O.O
description:
Made for JameGam #19

Description: Toys have infected your family and they are now trying to get you and spread the toy infection to you. 

Made By: Nathan Fordyce, and Thomas B

Note: The enemies were meant to have toy like features but wasn't achievable for us programmers, but hopefully it doesn't break the narrative theme of the game :D

Known Issues:

  • AI can sometimes be a little bit buggy
